amendment.description: To modify the timeline for establishment of the program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1920 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1920 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S525; text: CR S525) To modify the timeline for establishment of the program.
